Uses of Class
Player

  • Uses of Player in <Unnamed>

    Subclasses of Player in <Unnamed> 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BlockingPlayer
    The subclass of RandomPlayer class, that first looks at the board for a move that would block its opponent from winning on the next move.
    class  HumanPlayer
    The subclass of Player class, that will provide user interface to human players.
    class  RandomPlayer
    Subclass of Player class, represents a player type that uses a random generator and picks a vacant spot on the board, randomly.
    class  SmartPlayer
    The subclass of BlockingPlayer class, that first looks at the board for a move that could win, or would block its opponent from winning on the next move.

    static Player Game.create_player​(java.lang.String name, char mark, Board board, java.io.BufferedReader stdin)
    Creates the specified type of player indicated by the user.
    Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Player 
    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Sets the argument object to current oPlayer object.
    protected void Player.setOpponent​(Player opponent)
    Sets the argument Player object as the opponent attribute of current Player object.

    Sets the argument object to current xPlayer object.
